Kyung-Ryong Lee

Bldg.104, 50 UNIST-gil, Ulsan 44919, Republic of Korea • +82 10-2180-5843 • rgodragon@gmail.com

Research Interest

I am an HCI Researcher researching what value smart products linked with digital services can deliver in people's lives. In order to create an augmented user experience of digital services, we design and implement smart products that deliver the trace data of individuals remaining after using the service in daily life, and deploy them in the field for a long time to investigate user experiences. Research results are published at top tier HCI venues such as CHI and DIS.

Contact me
